articles.description: The Pennsylvania Department of Health is reporting 621 new cases of Coronavirus on Saturday, in addition to 24 more deaths.
articles.content:
HARRISBURG (KDKA) — The Pennsylvania Department of Health is reporting 621 new cases of Coronavirus on Saturday, in addition to 24 more deaths.
The statewide total number of cases has risen to 84,99… [+628 chars]

articles.title: U.S. CDC Coronavirus Data Bombshell Could Have a Huge Silver Lining - CCN.com
articles.description: CDC Director Robert Redfield has suggested there could be as many as 24 million cases of the coronavirus - 10x the current confirmed cases.
articles.content:
• This week the CDC said coronavirus has likely infected ten times more Americans than official case totals.
